tool_description: Runs numerical weather prediction models to generate forecast data using atmospheric physics equations and initial conditions.

model_type.description: Weather model to use: GFS, NAM, ECMWF, WRF

forecast_hours.description: Number of hours to forecast (1 to 240)

resolution.description: Model grid resolution: high, medium, low

boundary_conditions.description: Boundary condition source: global_model, analysis, climatology

physics_scheme.description: Physics parameterization scheme: default, tropical, winter, summer

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Unsupported model: Use one of [GFS, NAM, ECMWF, WRF].
Invalid forecast duration: forecast_hours must be between 1 and 240.
Invalid resolution: Use one of [high, medium, low].
Model initialization failed: Could not initialize model with provided parameters. Check initialization_time and boundary_conditions.
Unsupported variable: Requested forecast variable is not available for the selected model.
Invalid boundary conditions: Use one of [global_model, analysis, climatology].
Invalid physics scheme: Use one of [default, tropical, winter, summer].
usage: Specify location coordinates, model_type, forecast duration, and desired variables. Optionally configure resolution, initialization_time, boundary_conditions, and physics_scheme. Returns raw forecast data.
